overview:
Kovair Software, Inc. provides Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) and ITIL-compliant IT Service Management (ITSM) solutions, supporting global software development and IT management.

Kovairâ€™s product offerings are: ALM Studio, ITSM Studio, and Omnibus Integrations Middleware.

ALM Studio, 100% Web based, contains a single data repository package of key applications that include Requirements, Test, Issues, Risk and Release Management along with Project Management capabilities.

ITSM Studio, 100% Web based, provides multiple solutions including Helpdesk, Incident, Problem, Change, CMDB, and Service Catalogue. It is available both as on premise installation and as a Software-as a Service (Saas) model.

Omnibus Integrations Middlware, an SOA-based Enterprise Service Bus, enables integration of multiple ALM or IT management tools procured from different vendors.

Founded in 2000, Kovair is headquartered in Milpitas, California.
